About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Know Your State

This was my first project from the boot camp. Several months in and my group and I were able to develop an application that works. We used HTML/CSS to create a Login Page. We also used Firebase for the database to store the login information and email.

FitMe

For this project we used HTML/CSS for the frontend and login information. We also used Mongoose for the database, Handlebars and javascript. We also downloaded our application to Heroku.

SportsJunkies

This webpage has been constructed following codes from a MERN application. This application allows the user to follow their own personal spread to place bets. We used a website from Las Vegas to scrape the information. We used REACT, HTML/CSS, Mongoose, API (Fox Sports), Cheerio for scraping, and uploaded our project to Heroku
